name: Peter Morris
description: I am an honest heart that’s looking for a stable relationship. I understand it is important to lay down lasting foundations for a lasting relationship. I am an active person who enjoys cycling and running best. I believe keeping fit is important. I am not interested in games or drama. like getting out and checking out local talent and live concerts, here or anywhere. I enjoy movies and music for relaxation. A quiet night at home is also enjoyed and welcomed. I am open to try different activities and up for the challenge. I am looking for someone who has a great sense of humor and big heart, is curious about new things that would like to share new experiences or old habits. I am very gregarious and energetic. Also I am very active. I cannot sit in one place all the time. I need movement. I feel happy if I see many people near me. I like unusual feelings, to get to know something new. I never let myself give up and know, that no one will make me happy if I won’t feel this way myself and trust me, that I have enough courage and determination to make my woman happiest woman in the world!
